languages.text: "Вы... были в моровой яме. Вы. В яме". {n}Говоря это, он смотрит куда-то в пустоту.{/n} "Не сочтите за грубость, но мне даже в голову не приходит, что бы я сказал Мастеру дисциплины, сгинь вы там". {n}Капитан устало потирает висок.{/n} "Блюстители периодически проверяют, не таятся ли на дне отсека порченные. И я молю — оставьте эту работу нам".

traits.locale_text: "Вы... были в моровой яме. Вы. В яме". {n}Говоря это, он смотрит куда-то в пустоту.{/n} "Не сочтите за грубость, но мне даже в голову не приходит, что бы я сказал Мастеру дисциплины, сгинь вы там". {n}Капитан устало потирает висок.{/n} Насчет еретиков — блюстители периодически проверяют, не таятся ли на дне отсека сбежавшие преступники и мутанты. И я молю — оставьте эту работу нам".

languages.text: "You... went to the pestilence pit. You. Into the pestilence pit." {n}Frensoe stares off into the distance as he speaks.{/n} "Pardon me, Lord Captain. I just can't even begin to find the words I would use if I had to tell the Master-at-Arms that you had perished in there." {n}He rubs his temple wearily.{/n} "The enforcers do regular checks to see if there are any dangerous blight-stricken rejects hiding at the bottom of the bay. I implore you, Lord Captain — leave this job to us."
languages.original_text: "Вы... были в моровой яме. Вы. И я молю — оставьте эту работу нам".

And I implore you, Lord Captain — leave this job to us."

languages.text: «Usted... ha ido al pozo de pestilencia. Usted. En el pozo de pestilencia». {n}Frensoe mira a lo lejos mientras habla.{/n} «Discúlpeme, Capitán. Es que no se me ocurre qué podría haberle dicho a la maestra de armas de haber muerto usted ahí dentro». {n}Se frota la sien con cansancio.{/n} «Los guardias realizan controles periódicos para comprobar que no queden despojos infectados de plaga en el fondo de la bahía. Se lo imploro, Lord Capitán, deje que nos encarguemos nosotros».
languages.original_text: "You... went to the pestilence pit. You. Into the pestilence pit." {n}Frensoe stares off into the distance as he speaks.{/n} "Pardon me, Lord Captain. I just can't even begin to find the words I would use if I had to tell the Master-at-Arms that you had perished in there." {n}He rubs his temple wearily.{/n} "The enforcers do regular checks to see if there are any dangerous blight-stricken rejects hiding at the bottom of the bay. I implore you, Lord Captain — leave this job to us."

traits.locale_text: «Usted... ha ido al pozo de pestilencia. Usted. En el pozo de pestilencia». {n}Frensoe mira a lo lejos mientras habla.{/n} «Discúlpeme, Capitán. Es que no se me ocurre qué podría haberle dicho a la maestra de armas de haber muerto usted ahí dentro». {n}Se frota la sien con cansancio.{/n} «Los guardias realizan controles periódicos para comprobar que no queden despojos infectados de plaga en el fondo de la bahía. Se lo imploro, Lord Capitán, deje que nos encarguemos nosotros».

languages.text: 「疫病の巣窟に…行かれたのですか。あなた様が、疫病の巣窟の中へ」{n}フレンソーが遠い目をして話す。{/n}「失礼しました、ロード・キャプテン。あなた様の命があそこで尽きたとマスター・アット・アームに伝えることを想像したら、言葉が見つかりませんでした」{n}彼は疲れたようにこめかみをさする。{/n}「エンフォーサーが定期的に見に行って、ベイの奥底に病気持ちのはみ出し者が隠れていないか確認しています。お願いです、ロード・キャプテン…この件は私達にお任せください」
languages.original_text: "You... went to the pestilence pit. You. Into the pestilence pit." {n}Frensoe stares off into the distance as he speaks.{/n} "Pardon me, Lord Captain. I just can't even begin to find the words I would use if I had to tell the Master-at-Arms that you had perished in there." {n}He rubs his temple wearily.{/n} "The enforcers do regular checks to see if there are any dangerous blight-stricken rejects hiding at the bottom of the bay. I implore you, Lord Captain — leave this job to us."

traits.locale_text: 「疫病の巣窟に…行かれたのですか。あなた様が、疫病の巣窟の中へ」{n}フレンソーが遠い目をして話す。{/n}「失礼しました、ロード・キャプテン。あなた様の命があそこで尽きたとマスター・アット・アームに伝えることを想像したら、言葉が見つかりませんでした」{n}彼は疲れたようにこめかみをさする。{/n}「エンフォーサーが定期的に見に行って、ベイの奥底に病気持ちのはみ出し者が隠れていないか確認しています。お願いです、ロード・キャプテン…この件は私達にお任せください」

languages.text: “您……去了疫病坑。您，去了，疫病坑。”{n}弗伦索一边说着话，一边愣愣地看着远处。{/n}“请原谅，舰长大人。可万一我不得不通知戒律大师，说您在那片区域不幸遇难，我简直不知道这话该怎么说出口。”{n}他疲惫地揉着太阳穴。{/n}“执法者会定期清查最底层的甲板，消灭一切危险的东西。我真的求求您了，舰长大人，这种事情还是交给我们来做吧。”
languages.original_text: "You... went to the pestilence pit. You. Into the pestilence pit." {n}Frensoe stares off into the distance as he speaks.{/n} "Pardon me, Lord Captain. I just can't even begin to find the words I would use if I had to tell the Master-at-Arms that you had perished in there." {n}He rubs his temple wearily.{/n} "The enforcers do regular checks to see if there are any dangerous blight-stricken rejects hiding at the bottom of the bay. I implore you, Lord Captain — leave this job to us."

traits.locale_text: “您……去了疫病坑。您，去了，疫病坑。”{n}弗伦索一边说着话，一边愣愣地看着远处。{/n}“请原谅，舰长大人。可万一我不得不通知戒律大师，说您在那片区域不幸遇难，我简直不知道这话该怎么说出口。”{n}他疲惫地揉着太阳穴。{/n}“执法者会定期清查最底层的甲板，消灭一切危险的东西。我真的求求您了，舰长大人，这种事情还是交给我们来做吧。”

languages.text: « Vous... vous vous êtes {mf|aventuré|aventurée} dans la fosse aux pestilences. Vous. Dites-moi que je rêve. » {n}Le regard de Frensoe se perd au loin tandis qu'il poursuit.{/n} « Toutes mes excuses, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je peine à imaginer les mots que j'aurais bien pu employer si j'avais dû annoncer à la capitaine d'armes que vous y aviez trouvé la mort. » {n}Il se frotte la tempe avec lassitude.{/n} « Les prévôts conduisent régulièrement des inspections pour s'assurer que des laissés-pour-compte porteurs de miasmes dangereux ne se cachent pas dans les bas-fonds de la baie. Je vous en conjure, Votre Seigneurie, laissez-nous faire notre travail et ne vous mêlez pas de ça. »
languages.original_text: "You... went to the pestilence pit. You. Into the pestilence pit." {n}Frensoe stares off into the distance as he speaks.{/n} "Pardon me, Lord Captain. I just can't even begin to find the words I would use if I had to tell the Master-at-Arms that you had perished in there." {n}He rubs his temple wearily.{/n} "The enforcers do regular checks to see if there are any dangerous blight-stricken rejects hiding at the bottom of the bay. I implore you, Lord Captain — leave this job to us."

traits.locale_text: « Vous... vous vous êtes {mf|aventuré|aventurée} dans la fosse aux pestilences. Vous. Dites-moi que je rêve. » {n}Le regard de Frensoe se perd au loin tandis qu'il poursuit.{/n} « Toutes mes excuses, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je peine à imaginer les mots que j'aurais bien pu employer si j'avais dû annoncer à la capitaine d'armes que vous y aviez trouvé la mort. » {n}Il se frotte la tempe avec lassitude.{/n} « Les prévôts conduisent régulièrement des inspections pour s'assurer que des laissés-pour-compte porteurs de miasmes dangereux ne se cachent pas dans les bas-fonds de la baie. Je vous en conjure, Votre Seigneurie, laissez-nous faire notre travail et ne vous mêlez pas de ça. »

languages.text: "Ihr ... wart in der Pestgrube. Ihr. In der Pestgrube." {n}Frensoe blickt in die Ferne, während er spricht.{/n} "Verzeiht, Lord Captain. Ich wüsste nicht, welche Worte ich wählen würde, wenn ich der Waffenmeistern erklären müsste, dass Ihr dort den Tod gefunden habt." {n}Er reibt sich müde die Schläfe.{/n} "Die Enforcer machen regelmäßige Stichproben, um herauszufinden, ob sich irgendwelche gefährlichen Halunken auf dem Grund der Bucht herumtreiben. Ich flehe Euch an, Lord Captain ... überlasst das uns."
languages.original_text: "You... went to the pestilence pit. You. Into the pestilence pit." {n}Frensoe stares off into the distance as he speaks.{/n} "Pardon me, Lord Captain. I just can't even begin to find the words I would use if I had to tell the Master-at-Arms that you had perished in there." {n}He rubs his temple wearily.{/n} "The enforcers do regular checks to see if there are any dangerous blight-stricken rejects hiding at the bottom of the bay. I implore you, Lord Captain — leave this job to us."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr ... wart in der Pestgrube. Ihr. In der Pestgrube." {n}Frensoe blickt in die Ferne, während er spricht.{/n} "Verzeiht, Lord Captain. Ich wüsste nicht, welche Worte ich wählen würde, wenn ich der Waffenmeistern erklären müsste, dass Ihr dort den Tod gefunden habt." {n}Er reibt sich müde die Schläfe.{/n} "Die Enforcer machen regelmäßige Stichproben, um herauszufinden, ob sich irgendwelche gefährlichen Halunken auf dem Grund der Bucht herumtreiben. Ich flehe Euch an, Lord Captain ... überlasst das uns."

languages.text: "Siz... Veba çukuruna mı gittiniz? Siz! Veba çukurunda..." {n}Frensoe, konuşurken bakışları uzaklara dalıp gidiyor.{/n} "Kusuruma bakmayın Lord Kaptan. Orada canınızdan olsaydınız Silahtar'a bunu anlatırken kullanacağım kelimeleri bile bulmakta zorlanıyorum." {n}Bitkin bir hâlde şakaklarını ovuyor.{/n} "İnfazcılar; bölmenin dibinde hastalıktan muzdarip, tehlikeli insanların saklanıp saklanmadığına dair düzenli teftişler yapıyor. Yalvarırım Lord Kaptan, bu işi bize bırakın."
languages.original_text: "You... went to the pestilence pit. You. Into the pestilence pit." {n}Frensoe stares off into the distance as he speaks.{/n} "Pardon me, Lord Captain. I just can't even begin to find the words I would use if I had to tell the Master-at-Arms that you had perished in there." {n}He rubs his temple wearily.{/n} "The enforcers do regular checks to see if there are any dangerous blight-stricken rejects hiding at the bottom of the bay. I implore you, Lord Captain — leave this job to us."
